data.name: The Golden Time in high school
data.detailed_description:
The Golden Time in high school is a RPG game.Players can operate characters to explore freely on campus, collect information and props, participate in multiple branch plots and achieve achievements.

Game elements:
·Free exploration
·Multiple endings
·Information and items collecting
·Romantics

How to play?
You can chat with the characters to get information.
You can join some organizations to achieve your goal.
You can date with the girl you like.

This game give you a chance to experience the life in student time again.
I hope to bring you fun in the process of simulating high school life.

data.short_description: As a high school student of Shiguang high school, you will spend three years here. What kind of students that you will be? You can choose to study hard and get a good grade.You can choose to be an assistant to teacher to help with their daily affairs. Or just have a romantic date with somebody?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
